name: hovercraft
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a vehicle that travels quickly just above the surface of water or land by producing a current of air under it to support it
dan_prat/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
Examples
A hovercraft travels on a cushion of air.The express ferry service to Ireland is the hovercraft, but that is sometimes cancelled if the weather is bad.
